name: Imiquimod

indications.text: imiquimod cream , 3.75 % indicated topical treatment clinically typical , visible , palpable actinic keratoses ( ak ) face balding scalp immunocompetent adults . ( 1.1 ) imiquimod cream , 3.75 % indicated topical treatment external genital perianal warts ( egw ) immunocompetent patients 12 years age older . ( 1.2 )

contraindications.text: topical ; oral , ophthalmic , intra-anal intravaginal . ( 2.1 ) ak : apply thin layer daily bedtime affected area ( either entire face balding scalp ) two 2-week treatment cycles separated 2-week no-treatment period . apply 0.5 grams application . ( 2.2 ) egw : apply thin layer daily bedtime total clearance 8 weeks . apply 0.25 grams application . ( 2.3 )

warningsAndPrecautions: supplied imiquimod cream white faintly yellow color . 7.5 g pump bottle delivers fewer 28 full actuations . 7.5 g 3.75 % cream , ndc 68682-272-75. storage handling store 25°c ( 77°f ) ; excursions permitted 15° 30°c ( 59° 86°f ) [ usp controlled room temperature ] . avoid freezing . store imiquimod cream pump bottles upright .
indications_original: Imiquimod Cream, 3.75% is indicated for the topical treatment of clinically typical, visible, or palpable actinic keratoses (AK) of the face or balding scalp in immunocompetent adults. ( 1.1 ) Imiquimod Cream, 3.75% is indicated for the topical treatment of external genital and perianal warts (EGW) in immunocompetent patients 12 years of age or older. ( 1.2 )
contraindications_original: For topical use only; not for oral, ophthalmic, intra-anal or intravaginal use. ( 2.1 ) AK : Apply a thin layer once daily at bedtime to affected area (either entire face or balding scalp) for two 2-week treatment cycles separated by a 2-week no-treatment period. Apply up to 0.5 grams at each application. ( 2.2 ) EGW : Apply a thin layer once daily at bedtime until total clearance or up to 8 weeks. Apply up to 0.25 grams at each application. ( 2.3 )
warningsAndPrecautions_original:
How Supplied
                  
                  Imiquimod Cream is white to faintly yellow in color. The 7.5 g pump bottle delivers no fewer than 28 full actuations.
                  
                     7.5 g of the 3.75% cream, NDC 68682-272-75.
                  
                  
                     Storage and Handling
                  
                  Store at 25°C (77°F); excursions permitted to 15° to 30°C (59° to 86°F) [see USP Controlled Room Temperature]. Avoid freezing.
                  Store Imiquimod Cream pump bottles upright.
